Where should the LCG be used?
The LCG is designed to be used for all births in health facilities, including primary, secondary 
and tertiary care settings. Women giving birth in lower-level facilities may require referral to 
a higher level of care if complications ensue. Women in such settings should therefore have 
access to appropriate referral and transportation options for safe and timely transfer. The
